Developed by EA Sports, FIFA is a popular football simulation game series that has been around for over two decades. FIFA 21 is the latest offering from the series, which introduces new features and enhancements to make the gameplay more realistic and immersive. In this article, we will look at some of the key features of FIFA 21.

## Gameplay
FIFA 21 offers a more realistic and immersive gameplay experience compared to its previous versions. The game features new ball physics, which affects how the ball moves, bounces, and interacts with players. The AI has been improved to offer better attacking and defending strategies, making it more challenging for players to score goals.

Another exciting feature of FIFA 21 is the introduction of the Agile Dribbling system. This system allows players to move with more flexibility and finesse, making it easier to break away from defenders and create opportunities for scoring.

## Career Mode
FIFA 21 offers an improved Career Mode, where players can fully customize their team and manage their own club. The mode features an improved interactive match sim, which allows players to jump in and out of matches, adjusting strategies and making substitutions on the fly.

## Ultimate Team
Ultimate Team is another popular mode in FIFA 21. This mode allows players to build their own team, buy and sell players, and compete against other players in various online tournaments. The mode features Season Objectives, which offer rewards for completing various challenges throughout the season.

## Conclusion
Overall, FIFA 21 is another exciting offering from the popular football simulation game series. With its realistic gameplay, enhanced AI, and new features like Agile Dribbling, FIFA 21 is sure to keep players engaged and entertained for hours on end. Whether you are a fan of football or just looking for a great gaming experience, FIFA 21 is definitely worth a try.
